    Choices - Our Mission

    Our number one priority is to serve you, the customer. We've spent the past 30 years working to bring you the very best in recovery, health and wellness products and we are committed to continue serving the community by bringing you the best.
    We manufacture the largest selection of AA & NA medallions in the world so that you have the widest variety and most beautiful coins available at the very best price.
    We are open 7 days a week - you will always get a live member of our team to assist with your questions. Our goal is to be your number one shop for recovery and wellness.
    We are here to help. If you don't see what you are looking for, just email or call, we have a large selection of products in our NY store and its likely we will have what you need.
    We thank you for your business and hope you will continue to shop with us.
    Many blessings, please be safe and well.
